content: The current Argonaut questionnaire profile is based on 3.0.1 Are there any plans for an R4 version? I do not see any mention of upgrading the questionnaire on the Argonaut main page or on their 2019 project page. I don't see a new project page for 2020.
SDC is essentially the R4 version. It includes a much broader set of capabilities.
Argonaut is still a constrained set - are you wanting to relax those constraints on implementation expectation for R4? This would make me super excited (but even more super-surprised...) :)
